title: Website Backup & Disaster Recovery: A Practical Guide for Small Businesses
subTitle: How to plan, test, and recover from website failures (hacks, outages, accidental deletions)
description: Practical backup strategies, recovery playbook, testing cadence, and tooling recommendations for small businesses running websites on Shopify, self-hosted platforms, or cloud servers.
author: James Plant

metadata.title: Website Backup & Disaster Recovery: A Practical Guide for Small Businesses | The Bearded Developer
metadata.description: Learn backup strategies, recovery playbooks, and testing cadence to protect your website from hacks, outages and accidental data loss.
